sqlMap.update:
update PROD_OFFER
OFFER_TYPE=#offerType# PROD_OFFER_NAME=#prodOfferName# INNER_OFFER_NAME=#innerOfferName# STATUS_DATE=#statusDate# PROD_OFFER_PUBLISHER=#prodOfferPublisher# STATUS_CD=#statusCd# EFF_DATE=#effDate# EXP_DATE=#expDate# OFFER_NBR=#offerNbr# OFFER_PROVIDER_ID=#offerProviderId# BRAND_ID=#brandId# SERV_BRAND_ID=#servBrandId# TEMPLET_ID=#templetId# DEFAULT_TIME_PERIOD=#defaultTimePeriod# PROD_OFFER_DESC=#prodOfferDesc# EXT_PROD_OFFER_ID=#extProdOfferId# EXP_PROC_METHOD=#expProcMethod# VALUE_ADDED_FLAG=#valueAddedFlag# MANAGE_GRADE=#manageGrade# PROD_OFFER_INITIALAMOUNT=#prodOfferInitialamount# EXPIRE_HANDLE_CONDITION=#expireHandleCondition# COMMON_REGION_ID=#commonRegionId# MANAGE_GRADE2=#manageGrade2# CREATE_DT=#createDt# SIMPLE_SPELL=#simpleSpell# VERSION=#version# INNER_OFFER_NBR=#innerOfferNbr# PROD_OFFER_TRAIT=#prodOfferTrait# COOPERATION_TYPE=#cooperationType# LOGO_FILE_ID=#logoFileId# tenant_id=#tenantId#
PROD_OFFER_ID=#prodOfferId#
sqlMap.insert:
SELECT SEQ_PROD_OFFER.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
insert into PROD_OFFER (STATUS_DATE,CREATE_DT,VERSION
PROD_OFFER_ID OFFER_TYPE PROD_OFFER_NAME INNER_OFFER_NAME
PROD_OFFER_PUBLISHER STATUS_CD EFF_DATE EXP_DATE OFFER_NBR OFFER_PROVIDER_ID BRAND_ID SERV_BRAND_ID TEMPLET_ID DEFAULT_TIME_PERIOD PROD_OFFER_DESC EXT_PROD_OFFER_ID EXP_PROC_METHOD VALUE_ADDED_FLAG MANAGE_GRADE PROD_OFFER_INITIALAMOUNT EXPIRE_HANDLE_CONDITION COMMON_REGION_ID MANAGE_GRADE2
SIMPLE_SPELL
INNER_OFFER_NBR PROD_OFFER_TRAIT COOPERATION_TYPE LOGO_FILE_ID tenant_id
) values (SYS_EXTRACT_UTC(current_timestamp)+0,SYS_EXTRACT_UTC(current_timestamp)+0,SYS_EXTRACT_UTC(current_timestamp)+0
#offerType# #prodOfferName# #innerOfferName#
#prodOfferPublisher# #statusCd# #effDate# #expDate# #offerNbr# #offerProviderId# #brandId# #servBrandId# #templetId# #defaultTimePeriod# #prodOfferDesc# #extProdOfferId# #expProcMethod# #valueAddedFlag# #manageGrade# #prodOfferInitialamount# #expireHandleCondition# #commonRegionId# #manageGrade2#
#simpleSpell#
#innerOfferNbr# #prodOfferTrait# #cooperationType# #logoFileId# #tenantId#
)
sqlMap.select:
select * from PROD_OFFER
PROD_OFFER_ID=#prodOfferId# OFFER_TYPE=#offerType# PROD_OFFER_NAME=#prodOfferName# INNER_OFFER_NAME=#innerOfferName# STATUS_DATE=#statusDate# STATUS_CD=#statusCd# EFF_DATE=#effDate# PROD_OFFER_PUBLISHER=#prodOfferPublisher# EXP_DATE=#expDate# OFFER_PROVIDER_ID=#offerProviderId# OFFER_NBR=#offerNbr# BRAND_ID=#brandId# SERV_BRAND_ID=#servBrandId# TEMPLET_ID=#templetId# DEFAULT_TIME_PERIOD=#defaultTimePeriod# PROD_OFFER_DESC=#prodOfferDesc# EXT_PROD_OFFER_ID=#extProdOfferId# EXP_PROC_METHOD=#expProcMethod# VALUE_ADDED_FLAG=#valueAddedFlag# MANAGE_GRADE=#manageGrade# PROD_OFFER_INITIALAMOUNT=#prodOfferInitialamount# EXPIRE_HANDLE_CONDITION=#expireHandleCondition# COMMON_REGION_ID=#commonRegionId# MANAGE_GRADE2=#manageGrade2# CREATE_DT=#createDt# VERSION=#version# SIMPLE_SPELL=#simpleSpell# INNER_OFFER_NBR=#innerOfferNbr# PROD_OFFER_TRAIT=#prodOfferTrait# COOPERATION_TYPE=#cooperationType# LOGO_FILE_ID=#logoFileId# #tenantId#
and STATUS_CD!='1300'

select count(1) ALLNUM from PROD_OFFER
PROD_OFFER_ID=#prodOfferId# OFFER_PROVIDER_ID=#offerProviderId# PROD_OFFER_NAME like concat('%',#prodOfferName#,'%') COOPERATION_TYPE in
#cooperationType[]#
and STATUS_CD!='1300' and TENANT_ID=#tenantId#

select PROD_OFFER.* from PROD_OFFER
PROD_OFFER.OFFER_PROVIDER_ID=#offerProviderId# PROD_OFFER.COOPERATION_TYPE in
#cooperationType[]#
and PROD_OFFER.STATUS_CD!='1300' and TENANT_ID=#tenantId# ORDER BY PROD_OFFER.prod_offer_id DESC

select * from (select row_number() over( order by PROD_OFFER_ID desc ) rn , newtab.* from ( select PROD_OFFER.* ,offer_Prod_Rel.Product_Id from PROD_OFFER ,offer_Prod_Rel
PROD_OFFER.OFFER_PROVIDER_ID=#offerProviderId# PROD_OFFER.COOPERATION_TYPE=#cooperationType#
and PROD_OFFER.STATUS_CD!='1300' and PROD_OFFER.Prod_Offer_Id = offer_Prod_Rel.Prod_Offer_Id and PROD_OFFER.TENANT_ID=#tenantId# and offer_Prod_Rel.TENANT_ID=#tenantId# ) newtab ) where rn between #pro# and #end#

select count(1) ALLNUM from( select PROD_OFFER.* ,offer_Prod_Rel.Product_Id from PROD_OFFER ,offer_Prod_Rel where ((PROD_OFFER.COOPERATION_TYPE =#cooperationType# and PROD_OFFER.Prod_Offer_Id
(select Prod_Offer_Id from PROD_OFFER_CHANNEL where CHANNEL_ID in (select CHANNEL_ID from CHANNEL where ORG_ID =#offerProviderId#)) and offer_Prod_Rel.Product_Id in (select Product_Id from Product pro where pro.product_type =#telProductType#) ) or (PROD_OFFER.COOPERATION_TYPE =#othercooperationType# and PROD_OFFER.OFFER_PROVIDER_ID !=#offerProviderId# and PROD_OFFER.Prod_Offer_Id in (select Prod_Offer_Id from PROD_OFFER_CHANNEL where CHANNEL_ID in (select CHANNEL_ID from CHANNEL where ORG_ID =#offerProviderId#)) )) and PROD_OFFER.STATUS_CD != '1300' and PROD_OFFER.Prod_Offer_Id = offer_Prod_Rel.Prod_Offer_Id and PROD_OFFER.TENANT_ID=#tenantId# and offer_Prod_Rel.TENANT_ID=#tenantId# )

select * from (select row_number() over( order by PROD_OFFER_ID desc ) rn , newtab.* from ( select PROD_OFFER.* ,offer_Prod_Rel.Product_Id from PROD_OFFER ,offer_Prod_Rel where ((PROD_OFFER.COOPERATION_TYPE =#cooperationType#
and PROD_OFFER.Prod_Offer_Id in (select Prod_Offer_Id from PROD_OFFER_CHANNEL where CHANNEL_ID in (select CHANNEL_ID from CHANNEL where ORG_ID =#offerProviderId#)) and offer_Prod_Rel.Product_Id in (select Product_Id from Product pro where pro.product_type =#telProductType#) ) or (PROD_OFFER.COOPERATION_TYPE =#othercooperationType# and PROD_OFFER.OFFER_PROVIDER_ID !=#offerProviderId# and PROD_OFFER.Prod_Offer_Id in (select Prod_Offer_Id from PROD_OFFER_CHANNEL where CHANNEL_ID in (select CHANNEL_ID from CHANNEL where ORG_ID =#offerProviderId#)) )) and PROD_OFFER.STATUS_CD != '1300' and PROD_OFFER.Prod_Offer_Id = offer_Prod_Rel.Prod_Offer_Id ) newtab ) where rn between #pro# and #end#

select pc.cd,pc.name from pricing_classify pc, ATTR_PRICING_CLASSIFY_RELA apcr where pc.cd = apcr.pricing_classify and pc.tetenant_id=#tenantId#
and apcr.tetenant_id=#tenantId# and apcr.attr_spec_id in (select distinct attr_spec_id from product_attr where status_cd = #statuscd# and tetenant_id=#tenantId#
product_id in
#pids[]#
)
sqlMap.insert:
SELECT SEQ_PROD_OFFER_CHANNEL_TYPE.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
insert into PROD_OFFER_CHANNEL_TYPE (PROD_OFFER_CHANNEL_TYPE_ID,PROD_OFFER_ID,CHANNEL_TYPE,TENANT_ID) values (#prodOfferChannelTypeId# ,#prodOfferId# ,#channelType#,#tenantId#)
sqlMap.select:
select PROD_OFFER_CHANNEL_TYPE_ID prodOfferChannelTypeId, PROD_OFFER_ID prodOfferId, CHANNEL_TYPE channelType TENANT_ID tenantId from PROD_OFFER_CHANNEL_TYPE
PROD_OFFER_CHANNEL_TYPE_ID=#prodOfferChannelTypeId# PROD_OFFER_ID=#prodOfferId# CHANNEL_TYPE=#channelType# TENANT_ID=#tenantId#

select PRODUCT_ID productId, PRODUCT_NBR productNbr, PRODUCT_NAME productName, PRODUCT_DESC productDesc, MANAGE_GRADE manageGrade, PRODUCT_TYPE productType, PRODUCT_PROVIDER_ID productProviderId, STATUS_CD statusCd, EFF_DATE effDate, EXP_DATE expDate, PROD_FUNC_TYPE prodFuncType, EXT_PROD_ID extProdId, VALUE_ADDED_FLAG valueAddedFlag, INNER_PROD_NBR innerProdNbr, COMMON_REGION_ID commonRegionId, IS_TEMPLATE isTemplate, PARENT_PRODUCT_ID parentProductId, STATUS_DATE statusDate , CREATE_DATE createDate , COOPERATION_TYPE cooperationType TENANT_ID tenantId from PRODUCT
PRODUCT_ID=#productId# TENANT_ID=#tenantId#

select GROUP_RELA_ID productAttrGroupId, PRODUCT_ATTR_ID productAttrId, PRODUCT_ATTR_GROUP_ID productAttrGroupId tenant_id tenantId from PRODUCT_ATTR_GROUP_RELA
1=1 and GROUP_RELA_ID = #groupRelaId# PRODUCT_ATTR_ID =#productAttrId# PRODUCT_ATTR_GROUP_ID=#productAttrGroupId# tenant_id=#tenantId#

select PRODUCT_ATTR_GROUP_ID productAttrGroupId, PRODUCT_ID productId, GROUP_NAME groupName, PARENT_GROUP_ID parentGroupId, SEQ_ID SeqId, CREATE_DATE createDate, STATUS_CD stateCd, STATUS_DATE stateDate tenant_id tenantId from PRODUCT_ATTR_GROUP
1=1 and PRODUCT_ATTR_GROUP_ID = #productAttrGroupId# PRODUCT_ID =#productId# PARENT_GROUP_ID=#parentGroupId# TENANT_ID=#tenantId#
order by seq_id

select attr.*, spec.attr_spec_name, spec.attr_spec_desc, pagr.product_attr_group_id group_id, par.group_name, spec.default_value default_value_spec from PRODUCT_ATTR attr, ATTR_SPEC spec,PRODUCT_ATTR_GROUP_RELA pagr, PRODUCT_ATTR_GROUP par
attr.attr_spec_id = spec.attr_spec_id
and attr.product_attr_id = pagr.product_attr_id and par.product_attr_group_id = pagr.product_attr_group_id and attr.TENANT_ID=#tenantId# and spec.TENANT_ID=#tenantId# and pagr.TENANT_ID=#tenantId# and par.TENANT_ID=#tenantId# and attr.IS_AFFIRM_OPTION = #isAffirmOption# attr.product_id =#productId# attr.STATUS_CD =#statusCd#
order by attr.seq_id

select attr.*, spec.attr_spec_name, spec.attr_spec_desc, spec.default_value default_value_spec tenant_id tenantId from PRODUCT_ATTR attr, ATTR_SPEC spec
attr.attr_spec_id = spec.attr_spec_id and attr.product_attr_id not in (select product_attr_id from PRODUCT_ATTR_GROUP_RELA pagr, PRODUCT_ATTR_GROUP pag where pag.product_id =#productId# and pag.product_attr_group_id = pagr.product_attr_group_id) and pag.tenant_id=pagr.tenant_id and attr.TENANT_ID=#tenantId# and spec.TENANT_ID=#tenantId#
attr.IS_AFFIRM_OPTION = #isAffirmOption# attr.product_id =#productId# attr.STATUS_CD =#statusCd#
order by attr.seq_id

select attr.*, spec.attr_spec_name, spec.attr_spec_desc, pagr.product_attr_group_id group_id, par.group_name, spec.default_value default_value_spec from PRODUCT_ATTR attr, ATTR_SPEC spec,PRODUCT_ATTR_GROUP_RELA pagr, PRODUCT_ATTR_GROUP par
attr.attr_spec_id = spec.attr_spec_id and attr.product_attr_id = pagr.product_attr_id and par.product_attr_group_id = pagr.product_attr_group_id and attr.TENANT_ID=#tenantId# and spec.TENANT_ID=#tenantId# and pagr.TENANT_ID=#tenantId# and par.TENANT_ID=#tenantId# and attr.IS_AFFIRM_OPTION = #isAffirmOption# attr.product_id =#productId#
order by attr.seq_id

select tab.*, row_number() over(partition by PARENT_GROUP_ID order by group_id ) rn from ( select distinct (par.product_attr_group_id) group_id, par.group_name, par.PARENT_GROUP_ID, par.seq_id from PRODUCT_ATTR_GROUP par, PRODUCT_ATTR_GROUP_RELA pagr where par.product_attr_group_id = pagr.product_attr_group_id and par.product_id =#productId# and par.status_cd='1000' and pagr.TENANT_ID=#tenantId# and par.TENANT_ID=#tenantId# order by par.seq_id, group_id) tab

select pcl.NAME, ppl.PRICING_DESC, ppl.BEYOND_DESC from PRICING_PLAN ppl, PRICING_CLASSIFY pcl where ppl.PRICING_CLASSIFY = pcl.cd and ppl.PRICING_INFO_ID in (select PRICING_INFO_ID from PROD_OFFER_PRICING where PROD_OFFER_ID =#prodOfferId# and TENANT_ID=#tenantId#) and ppl.TENANT_ID=#tenantId# and pcl.TENANT_ID=#tenantId#

select av.ATTR_VALUE_NAME, av.ATTR_VALUE,av.ATTR_VALUE_ID,attr.ATTR_SPEC_ID, attr.PRODUCT_ATTR_ID from ATTR_VALUE av, PRODUCT_ATTR attr where av.attr_spec_id = attr.attr_spec_id and attr.product_id =#productId# and av.TENANT_ID=#tenantId# and attr.TENANT_ID=#tenantId# order by av.SEQ_ID

select PROD_ATTR_VALUE_ID prodAttrValueId,PRODUCT_ATTR_ID productAttrId,ATTR_VALUE_ID attrValueId,RULE_TYPE ruleType from PROD_ATTR_VALUE
PROD_ATTR_VALUE_ID=#prodAttrValueId# PRODUCT_ATTR_ID=#productAttrId# ATTR_VALUE_ID=#attrValueId# RULE_TYPE=#ruleType# tenant_id=#tenantId#
sqlMap.update:
update PRODUCT_ATTR
PRODUCT_ID=#productId# ATTR_SPEC_ID=#attrSpecId# DEFAULT_VALUE=#defaultValue# CREATE_DATE=#createDate# STATUS_CD=#statusCd# STATUS_DATE=#statusDate# PRODUCT_ATTR_DESC=#productAttrDesc# DISPLAY_TYPE=#displayType# IS_AFFIRM_OPTION=#isAffirmOption# tenant_id=#tenantId#
PRODUCT_ATTR_ID=#productAttrId# TENANT_ID=#tenantId#
update PRODUCT_ATTR set STATUS_CD =#stateCd# where PRODUCT_ATTR_ID in (select PRODUCT_ATTR_ID from PRODUCT_ATTR_GROUP_RELA where PRODUCT_ATTR_GROUP_ID=#productAttrGroupId#) and TENANT_ID=#tenantId#

update PRODUCT_ATTR_GROUP
GROUP_NAME=#groupName# PARENT_GROUP_ID=#parentGroupId# SEQ_ID=#SeqId# CREATE_DATE=#createDate# STATUS_CD=#stateCd# STATUS_DATE=#stateDate# tenant_id=#tenantId#
PRODUCT_ATTR_GROUP_ID=#productAttrGroupId# tenant_id=#tenantId#

update PRICING_PLAN
PRICING_DESC=#pricingDesc# PRICING_CLASSIFY=#pricingClassify# BEYOND_DESC=#beyondDesc# tenant_id=#tenantId#
PRICING_INFO_ID=#pricingInfoId#
sqlMap.delete: delete PROD_OFFER_PRICING where PRICING_INFO_ID=#pricingInfoId# and TENANT_ID=#tenantId#
